DBQuery_Data.DB_CrewName: select p.login_name from personnel p inner join dp_unit du on p.personnel_id=du.leader_pers_id where du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd') and du.unit=${OGF_USER}
DBQuery_Data.DB_FS_User: select p.login_name, du.unit, du.shift_date from dp_unit du inner join personnel p on du.leader_pers_id=p.personnel_id where du.s_mode='A' and (du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE-1, 'yyyymmdd') or du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyymmdd')) and p.p_security_group = 'CREW_ADMIN' and p.active=1 and p.password='HDqr02stllvo' and p.personnel_id not in (select th.personnel_id from timesheet_header th where th.timesheet_date=du.shift_date) and p.agency_code='EPB' and du.key_id not in (select distinct unit_key_id from crew_connectivity_log) Order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
DBQuery_Data.DB_OGF_User: select p.login_name, du.unit, du.shift_date from dp_unit du inner join personnel p on du.leader_pers_id=p.personnel_id where du.s_mode='A' and (du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE-1, 'yyyymmdd') or du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyymmdd')) and p.p_security_group = 'CREW' and p.active=1 and p.password='HDqr02stllvo' and p.personnel_id not in (select th.personnel_id from timesheet_header th where th.timesheet_date=du.shift_date) and p.agency_code='EPB' and du.key_id not in (select distinct unit_key_id from crew_connectivity_log) Order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
DBQuery_Data.DB_OGF_User_Filter1_MTRREAD: select p.login_name, du.unit, du.shift_date from dp_unit du inner join personnel p on du.leader_pers_id=p.personnel_id where du.s_mode='A' and (du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE-1, 'yyyymmdd') or du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyymmdd')) and p.p_security_group = 'CREW' and p.active=1 and p.password='HDqr02stllvo' and p.personnel_id not in (select th.personnel_id from timesheet_header th where th.timesheet_date=du.shift_date) and p.agency_code='EPB' and du.key_id not in (select distinct unit_key_id from crew_connectivity_log) and du.p_filter1='MTRREAD' Order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
DBQuery_Data.DB_OGF_User_Filter1_NOT_MTRREAD: select p.login_name, du.unit, du.shift_date from dp_unit du inner join personnel p on du.leader_pers_id=p.personnel_id where du.s_mode='A' and (du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE-1, 'yyyymmdd') or du.shift_date=TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyymmdd')) and p.p_security_group = 'CREW' and p.active=1 and p.password='HDqr02stllvo' and p.personnel_id not in (select th.personnel_id from timesheet_header th where th.timesheet_date=du.shift_date) and p.agency_code='EPB' and du.key_id not in (select distinct unit_key_id from crew_connectivity_log) and du.p_filter1!='MTRREAD' Order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
DBQuery_Data.DB_OGW_User: select * from (select p.login_name from personnel p where p.active=1 and p.password='HDqr02stllvo' and p.p_security_group in (select p_security_group from security_access where pgm='WEBDISPATCH') Order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where rownum < 2
DBQuery_Data.DB_StatusGroup: select sgs.STATUS_GROUP_ID, sgs.STATUS_CODE, sgs.CODE_ORDER, sgs.FIRST_SELECTED, sgs.WEIGHT, sgs.ACTIVE_CARD, sgs.SUSPEND_STATUS, sgs.SUSPEND_MSG, sgs.EXTERNAL_DISPOSE_FLG, sgs.STATUS_EMERGENCY_TIMER_ACK_FLG, sgs.REASON_CODE_REQUIRED_FLG, sgs.ALLOW_CANCEL_AVAIL_APPOINT_FLG, sgs.FORM_GROUP_NAME, sgs.FIRST_REPORTING_STATUS_FLG, sgs.EN_ROUTE_FLG, sgs.ON_SITE_FLG, sgs.TRANSFER_ON_REASSIGN_FLG, b07.b07_description, b07.b07_color from status_group_status sgs left join b07_status b07 on sgs.status_code=b07.b07_status_code where status_group_id=(select case when status_group_id is not null then status_group_id else (select status_group_id from agency where agency_code=(select agency_code from isr where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}')) end as statusGroupId from service_code where agency_code=(select agency_code from isr where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}') and service_code=(select final_service_code from isr where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}')) order by sgs.code_order
DBQuery_Data.DB_DisposeJob: select AUTO_DISPOSE_MOB from service_code where SERVICE_CODE='${JOBTYPE}'
DBQuery_Data.DB_CrewJobCount: select count(*) from c03_assign where unit='${CREW}' and shift_date=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') and b07_current_status<>'CL'
DBQuery_Data.DB_Assignmentlist_StatusDesc: select b07_description from b07_status where b07_status_code=(select b07_current_status from c03_assign where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}')
DBQuery_Data.DB_FieldReport_For_Job: select FIELD_REPORT_TEMPLATE_NAME from job_type_field_reports where job_type=(select final_service_code from isr where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}') and agency_code=(select agency_code from isr where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}') and field_report_container_name=' ' union select FIELD_REPORT_container_NAME from job_type_field_reports where job_type=(select final_service_code from isr where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}') and agency_code=(select agency_code from isr where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}') and FIELD_REPORT_TEMPLATE_NAME=''
DBQuery_Data.DB_JOBAgency: select Agency_code from ISR where isr_no='${JOBNUMBER}'
DBQuery_Data.DB_CREW_PLANCODE: select p_plan_code from dp_unit where unit='${CREW}' and shift_date=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
DBQuery_Data.DB_CREW_SHIFTCODE: select S02_SHIFT_CODE from dp_unit where unit='${CREW}' and shift_date=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
DBQuery_Data.DB_CREW_STATUSCODE: select b07_status_code from dp_unit where shift_date=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd') and unit='${CREW}'
DBQuery_Data.DB_CREW_STATUSCODE_DESCRIPTION: select b07_description from b07_status where b07_status_code=(select b07_status_code from dp_unit where shift_date=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd') and unit='${CREW}')
DBQuery_Data.DB_SYSTEMMESSAGE: select description from system_message where msg_code='${CAD_Parameter}'
DBQuery_Data.DB_SYSTEMPARAMETER_DESC: select PARAMETER_DESC from cad_parameters where parameter_name='${CAD_Parameter}'
DBQuery_Data.DB_SYSTEMPARAMETER_VALUE: select case when (select parameter_value FROM cad_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'SHOWBOSFORM' AND agency_code = (SELECT MAX(agency_code) FROM dp_unit WHERE unit = (SELECT UNIT FROM d03_unit_member WHERE personnel_id IN (SELECT personnel_id FROM personnel WHERE login_name = '${OGF_USER}') AND shift_date = TO_CHAR(LOCALTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') AND d03s_mode = 'A' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY))) is not null then (select parameter_value FROM cad_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'SHOWBOSFORM' AND agency_code = (SELECT MAX(agency_code) FROM dp_unit WHERE unit = (SELECT UNIT FROM d03_unit_member WHERE personnel_id IN (SELECT personnel_id FROM personnel WHERE login_name = '${OGF_USER}') AND shift_date = TO_CHAR(LOCALTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') AND d03s_mode = 'A' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY))) else (select parameter_value FROM cad_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'SHOWBOSFORM' AND agency_code = 'ALL') end as value from dual
DBQuery_Data.DB_SYSTEMPARAMETER_VALUE_FSUSER: select case when (select parameter_value FROM cad_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'SHOWBOSFORM' AND agency_code = (SELECT MAX(agency_code) FROM dp_unit WHERE unit = (SELECT UNIT FROM d03_unit_member WHERE personnel_id IN (SELECT personnel_id FROM personnel WHERE login_name = '${FS_USER}') AND shift_date = TO_CHAR(LOCALTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') AND d03s_mode = 'A' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY))) is not null then (select parameter_value FROM cad_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'SHOWBOSFORM' AND agency_code = (SELECT MAX(agency_code) FROM dp_unit WHERE unit = (SELECT UNIT FROM d03_unit_member WHERE personnel_id IN (SELECT personnel_id FROM personnel WHERE login_name = '${FS_USER}') AND shift_date = TO_CHAR(LOCALTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') AND d03s_mode = 'A' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY))) else (select parameter_value FROM cad_parameters WHERE parameter_name = 'SHOWBOSFORM' AND agency_code = 'ALL') end as value from dual
DBQuery_Data.DB_CREW_MAKEUP_ACTIVE_BADGENO: select BADGE_NO from personnel where ACTIVE='1' and P_PAY_CODE_REG IS NOT NULL and AGENCY_CODE='${Agency}'  Order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM FETCH FIRST ROW ONLY
DBQuery_Data.DB_CREW_MAKEUP_ACTIVE_PRIMARY_BADGENO: select BADGE_NO from personnel where login_name= '${Primary_User}' and AGENCY_CODE='${Agency}'
DBQuery_Data.DB_CREW_MAKEUP_ACTIVE_FIRSTNAME: select FIRST_NAME FROM personnel WHERE BADGE_NO ='${User}' and AGENCY_CODE='${Agency}'
DBQuery_Data.DB_BEGINNING_OF_SHIFT: select PARAMETER_VALUE from cad_parameters where parameter_name='SHOWBOSFORM' and Agency_code='ALL'

SystemMessages.UNABLE_TO_LUNCHON_CREW_OFFDUTY: Lunch On/Off - Unable to set lunch on, crew is off duty or in duty
SystemMessages.NOA_CANNOT_CREATE: Cannot create a Non Order Activity - The crew has to be in duty to create a Non Order Activity
